mutation accountManagementAddAccount ( $accountId:ID! $addAccountInput:AddAccountInput!) {
	accountManagement ( accountId:$accountId ) {
		addAccount ( input:$addAccountInput  )  {
			id
			name
			description
			timeZone
			type
			tenancy
			audit {
				createdBy
				createdTime
			}
			plan
			status
		}
	}	
}
